org.clafer.common

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.clafer.common.Util

  • public class Util
extends Object
    Various static utility functions.

    jimmy

      • takeUntil

        public static <T> List<T> takeUntil(T item,
                    List<T> list)
        Returns a sublist from index 0 to the index of the item (inclusive). Equivalent to the Haskell code takeWhile (== item) list
        Type Parameters:
        T - the element type
        Parameters:
        item - the item to find
        list - the list of items
        Returns:
        a prefix of the list ending at the first item if found, otherwise the entire list

      • dropUntil

        public static <T> List<T> dropUntil(T item,
                    List<T> list)
        Returns a sublist from the index of the item (inclusive) to the end of the list. Equivalent to the Haskell code dropWhile (/= item) list
        Type Parameters:
        T - the element type
        Parameters:
        item - the item to find
        list - the list of items
        Returns:
        a suffix of the list starting at the first item if found, otherwise the entire list
